#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
   {
    int t;
    long long n,c;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {   int z=0;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&c );
        long long x=1,y;
        while(x<=2)
        {  y=2*c-n*(n-1)*x;
            if(y>0)
            {
                if(y%(2*n)==0)
                {
                    z=1;
                }

            }
            if(z==1)
                break;
            x++;
        }
        if(z==1)
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        else cout<<"No"<<endl;
    }
   }
